item.title: Trump threatens to 'eradicate' Hamas if the Palestinian militant group doesn't abide by ceasefire
item.description: President Trump threatened Monday to "eradicate" the Palestinian militant group Hamas if it doesn't follow through with its ceasefire deal with Israel...

item.title: Trump says Ukraine could win war with Russia, but it's unlikely
item.description: President Trump said Monday that Ukraine could win its more than two-year war with Russia, but the odds of victory are unlikely.

item.title: U.S. and Australia sign rare earth minerals-sharing agreement

item.title: Republicans declare 'Coal Week' as Trump administration leads fossil-fuel comeback
item.description: Senate Republicans will introduce a resolution Monday declaring "Coal Week."
